name: Generate Position Measurement
func:
var payload = msg.payload.packet.decoded.payload

// Check if altitude is less than or equal to -1000 or greater than or equal to 15000
if (payload.altitude <= -1000 || payload.altitude >= 15000) {
    payload.altitude = 0; // Set altitude to 0
}

var out = [{
    "lat": payload.latitudeI * 1e-7,
    "lon": payload.longitudeI * 1e-7,
    "alt": payload.altitude,
    "tm": payload.time,
    "satsInView": payload.satsInView,
    "groundSpeed": payload.groundSpeed,
    "groundTrack": payload.groundTrack,
    "pDOP": payload.PDOP,
},
{
    "from": msg.payload.packet.fromHex,
    "fromShortName": msg.payload.packet.fromShortName,
    "fromLongName": msg.payload.packet.fromLongName,
    "fromHardware": msg.payload.packet.fromHardware,
    "to": msg.payload.packet.toHex,
    "toShortName": msg.payload.packet.toShortName,
    "toLongName": msg.payload.packet.toLongName,
    "toHardware": msg.payload.packet.toHardware,
    "channelId": msg.payload.channelId,
    "gatewayId": msg.payload.gatewayId
}]

msg.payload = out

return msg;

name: Inject Node Names and Hardware
Deduplicate Packets by Id

label: Meshtastic2skylines
info:
Foward position data to skylines using data from mqtt broker.

Set shortname to skylines tracking ID.

name: filtercrap
toskylines
